text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: ――This year, once again, there have been many unforgettable races, and many new legends were created.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: This time, we'll be rewarding the Uma Musume that has won the most Majors with a brand new Racing Uniform.

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: Well then, thank you for waiting. We'll now begin the URA Awards ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's get this party started by blowing the lid off this boring venue.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Don't you dare! This is supposed to be a stately event!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, but I do understand the feeling of wanting to liven things up.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Normally, we're always being praised by the loud cheers from the stands, after all.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! Uoooooh～ it's so moviiiing～!! ……when the stands are overflowing with that kind of cheering!
Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.
Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Even now, it's still a mysterious feeling――

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: She came all the way from Hokkaido, and even gets lost within the academy. She should be someone you just can't leave on their own but……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It seems like everything happened so fast but, thinking back on it, quite a lot has happened, hasn't it?

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: And now, moving on to the announcement. The Uma Musume that showed us many big achievements, and contributed greatly――

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: From Team <Sirius>, Special Week-san!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm S-S-S-Special Week!!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on your victories. Please tell us your thoughts.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! It's an honor to receive this prestigious award……!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: She's so stiff, isn't she……?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suu～……haa～…… Um…… well, you see……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……the reason I was able to make it to this point, truly took many things, each of these was incredibly important.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It started with the dream left to me by both of my moms, and running together with all my friends―― my rivals……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It wasn't just a simple path. There were hills, and times when things got rough, truly there was a lot.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But, all that time, Trainer-san was there to support me. Showing me the path I needed to take.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: By doing that, I was able to face each hurdle one by one, because of that, I'm here now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Moving forward, I have no idea how far I can go to fulfill everyone's dreams, but――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: To show people many dreams, even those that seem out of reach, that's the kind of Uma Musume I will continue to run as!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……rather than nervousness, maybe I'm excited and looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I feel the same, I've wanted to run together with everyone after all……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The battle we've all been waiting for…… so that we'll have no regrets, we'll run with all we've got.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah! With everyone doing their best, a serious competition!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: As Japan's #1, I'll be running while shouldering everyone's dreams!
